# GitHub Profile

This is my professional GitHub profile README showcasing my work as a Solutions Architect with a background in Psychology, Neuroscience, and Data Science.

## Structure

- `.github/workflows/` - Automated workflows for profile updates
  - `metrics.yml` - GitHub metrics generation
  - `snake.yml` - Contribution snake animation
- `README.md` - Main profile page
- `github-metrics.svg` - Auto-generated metrics visualization

## Workflows

### Snake Animation
Automatically generates a snake eating contributions graph animation daily and on every push.

### Metrics
Generates detailed GitHub activity metrics including coding habits and contribution statistics.

## Customization

To update your profile:
1. Edit `README.md` with your information
2. Update workflow files if needed
3. Commit and push changes
4. Workflows will automatically update visual elements

## Technologies Used

- GitHub Actions
- GitHub README Stats
- Skill Icons
- Typing SVG
- Contribution Snake Generator
